author: Brandjuh
description: Scrapes alliance log data from MissionChief USA with special handling for training courses. Tracks all alliance activity including promotions, building expansions, and training starts.
install_msg:
✅ Logs Scraper installed!

Use `[p]load logsscraper` to enable.

Commands (owner only):
• `[p]scrape_logs` - Manual scrape

Automatic scraping runs every hour at :15

Database: scraper_databases/logs.db
Tables: logs (general), training_courses (up to 4 duplicates per timestamp)
short: Alliance activity logs scraper with training course tracking
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores scraped MissionChief alliance log data in a local SQLite database.
